author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
If you recall a few years back Wolfire Games launched an antitrust lawsuit against Valve and a few months later it got dismissed, well it didn't go away and now it has returned with a vengeance.

title: Valve's Antitrust Case Returns With A Vengeance
